message.name: INF_ALLOCATION_TARGET_CANNOT_BE_FOUND
message.locale: The allocation target with identifier "%1s" cannot be found on the system. Please choose either another allocation target or another type of allocation strategy to use.

message.name: INF_FAILURE_ALLOCATION_TARGET_CANNOT_BE_FOUND
message.locale: The failure allocation target with identifier "%1s" cannot be found on the system. Please choose another allocation target to use.
